website_summaries.verdict: This tub is great as a cleaning bucket or basket that stores flat and is sturdy when extended.
pros: The size and shape of this bucket makes it work for many uses
Two handles make it easy to carry
Helps carry a lot of items
cons: Folds to about 2 1/2 inches flat, which is not as narrow as others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I loved the first one so much that I bought A second one. Easy to open up and collapse and will be perfect for camping! I love the handle because it makes it so versatile. Saves in space and packing!
customer_reviews.author: RayJoni07

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: I literally just bought this about 2 weeks ago for a camping trip that I got back from today. I used this exactly one time to do dishes and the screw holding one of the handles in place was broken even before I took it out to use it. It's super flimsy and very difficult to to collapse back down again. It was totally useless and I ended up throwing it out at the campground. I'm really disappointed that I spent about 17 bucks on this, a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Laundry and Other Uses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace the bin that came with my Kohler laundry sink. The original bin cracked and replacing it was a lot more money. This is a better solution because it folds up and goes under the sink when not in use. It can also be carried in and out of the room which has been super helpful in cleaning up some big nasty messes elsewhere in the house. After using it just a week, I bought two more.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kozol

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Cute bucket, works great for our needs. Two drawbacks it is a little too big for our sink, in our RV and the handles are a bit thin. Handles are sturdy enough as long as the bucket isn't overfilled. Worth buying. Might even buy another one. Love how flat they store.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Breaker

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Though the frame an handles are plastic, they are of good quality. Might be a little small for washing dishes, but great around the lake or camper (storage being an issue) to take a few snacks to Happy Hour.Don't forget the bucket, too!
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were a great idea....So handy when you have to go to Sam's Club or to the farmer's market....
customer_reviews.author: wanda marshall

customer_reviews.title: We like it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really versatile medium sized tray, basket or waterproof washtub for camping, picnic, BBQ. Folds flat to ~2" thickness. Nice for RV's, marine, teardrops, tiny home or just as a space saver in a larger home. We like it!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: I am disabled. So ai can walk short distances with a cane but for the most part, I use a wheelchair. This basket makes shopping and just carrying stuff so much easier! I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Abbe Norma

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I like that the basket collapses and stores easily when not in use. I use it in my trailer to haul items in and out for cooking outdoors. Saves me a lot of running back and forth to get stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Broke handle on 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: Handle broke on second trip to fill it up to do dishes! It will still work with out the handles but not as easy! Would look for sturdier bucket! I wanted the claps one so it take up more space but next time I’ll just buy one that’s sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: A camping must have
customer_reviews.text: I will admit this was sturdier than I anticipated. I fill it with water and was surprised the handles were easily able to handle the weight. It was great for washing dishes and hands during a camping trip. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. They have come through when I was in a pinch and needed an extra sink, wash basin, something to carry wet trash or other gooey items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portable dish pan or carrying caddy
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to use as a portable dish pan. But I am using it every day to haul cleaning supplies and tools around. It's a wonderful, all-purpose basin/caddy.
customer_reviews.author: tinycamper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Camping Sink
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect basin for a camping sink. It is a bit large but it fits well in our box since it is collapsible. The material makes it easy to clean and is all around exactly what I was looking for. All around a 5 star product
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Ehr

customer_reviews.title: great product! Versatile. One hand if you need the other ie: holding a walking cane!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Many uses. I bought it to take my meals from kitchen to bed. I can use only one hand because I am using a cane to walk after foot surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Adulting 101: Handwashing Delicates
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my small one bedroom apartment in NYC. I needed something that I could use to hand wash my delicates in while at the same time saving space or even storing things things I needed to wash through the week. The size and collapsibility is perfect. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great foldable basket! I am not a big fan of plastic bags from the store. I use this basket to carry multiple items up and down the stairs (I tend to drop things). Very sturdy and roomy!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Convience and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two and use them every day for many purposes: in the kitchen, bathroon, bedroom so far. When i travel ny car i pack it full of needed items so they are within reach.
customer_reviews.author: Robi

customer_reviews.title: Small package
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the collapsible clothes hamper well it will hold 3 socks and a pair of small underwear. It's a bucket. Good product but bad advertisement so bad...
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Deitsch

customer_reviews.title: We use it
customer_reviews.text: I like the function of it we use it a lot for the sink to rinse things and put direct in dishwasher after no gunk.
customer_reviews.author: DaniyVane

customer_reviews.title: Xmas present
customer_reviews.text: I love it, made well and easy to fold and unfold! Great gift ideal for that fisherman of mine!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti-lu Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the RV!!!
customer_reviews.text: We use this in my fifth wheel. It’s perfect for carrying items in and out of the trailer for meals, snacks, s’mores, etc. It’s easy to wash too. It’s collapsible and fits perfectly in small areas! It was a little smaller than I had initially thought, but holds a lot once filling it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Rolston

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a mop bucket, or just cleaning liquid for whatever you might be scrubbing down!
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Very handy, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time in my dorm room to clean dishes in and simply carry dishes to the kitchen for cooking. It’s very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Huston

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: What I love about the basket is the double handles AND that its collapsible. I may have to purchase in a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: freakgirl11

customer_reviews.title: Two Reasons
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for 2 reason the first for our family camping trip and second for a basket to use when needed around the house/garden. Love the multi purpose option with these and have two helps me keep them where I need them!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Motz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: We use this camping and it’s perfect for washing dishes. It closes up so it’s not a hassle to pack. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted, large capacity and collapsible. The handles are a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy I bought one will probably get more for other stuff
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS! You can use this for about anything it’s a really good size and I can store it just about anywhere. I use it to soak my feet, it’s easy to use and clean. (:
customer_reviews.author: Kelly jovanna

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than represented
customer_reviews.text: This was way smaller than I had expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Johnson

customer_reviews.title: collapsible, very functional
customer_reviews.text: It is made of very sturdy material. We enjoy the practicality of this tub.
customer_reviews.author: JB Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Good for dishes.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for backwoodsish camping. Good size. Compact. Suited our needs to wash a small amount of dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It's really not that difficult to pop open if you use both hands. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sara R.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Large when open, compact when closed. Was able to carry all my dishes to the campground sink with a dab of soap already in it.
customer_reviews.author: TheSonOfThor

customer_reviews.title: Great to store in small places.
customer_reviews.text: I love this for camping. So useful. Love that it colapsable.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it supposed to. We use it to store & wash dirty camping dishes and love it
customer_reviews.author: LucyF

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, great price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for camping to transport dirty dishes to wash station. Very sturdy, I like that it collapses down as a space saver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Used it for getting produce out of garden. Easy to store & cleaning a breeze would totally order again
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is not the biggest tub but it fits in my sink and is so much easier to grab out than the one I had before. It is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Has been great for car camping as a wash basin
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Quick to open and close
customer_reviews.text: Loving the basket so far. It closes and opens easily.
customer_reviews.author: Swoosh Vee

customer_reviews.title: Good item, color not accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is really great! Living in a small apartment (NYC small), items like buckets are the type of luxury you just don’t have space for. I selected this shape because I sometimes attach a rug to my swiffer and gotta be able to dip it, so round doesn’t work. It looks nice enough that I’m gonna use it as a beer ice bucket for my party tomorrow too. By the way - for those who care - the color is not really accurate. The first picture is much better but that depends on monitor settings- I definitely wouldn’t describe it as “bright blue”. It’s teal and not bright by any means
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to carry items in and out of my screened in porch. It is so handy to carry dishes, napkins, silverware, etc. Great useful product. I’ve also used to keep a few bottles of beer and drinks cold in ice . I love that I can just collapse it and store it for winner in a chest on the porch. Double handles a very sturdy. Great, useful product.
customer_reviews.author: J9

customer_reviews.title: Super handy
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well-made product - not flimsy at all. I love that you can collapse it: all the way for storage or just halfway for smaller loads. The handles are a really nice feature, too. I use it on an almost daily basis for carrying stuff from one level to another in my house. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product. Great for small jobs and it hides away.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I was looking for something to wash my small Chihuahua in. This tub is absolutely perfect. It does not leak and not very heavy to carry. Love the ability that it collapses so it can be placed away neatly.
customer_reviews.author: E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: So versatile! Love the handles and that it collapses for storage. Going to order another.
customer_reviews.text: So love this tub. Used it camping for the first time and about to order a second. Just sad that the turquoise color is no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: She_ra_ramm

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice, good quality, sturdy. Just what I ordered and I would order again. It was too big for what I wanted to use it for but that is my fault. I wish they made one just a bit smaller like 1.5 gal. Great product though.
customer_reviews.author: micro sd

customer_reviews.title: Great container
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to bring food and drink items out to the patio when I have guests. This works great, since I have limited storage space. It is sturdy, and very handy for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Buck

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this to use for washing dishes while camping. The handles were especially nice when having to carry a distance to be able to wash. It collapses in on itself to save room, and is made out of very good quality materials. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: Handles very unstable (I had water in it, picked it up by handles & water spilled all over floor!!) & basket hard to fold down.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: 100 percent recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I suffer with neuropathy. I need to soothe my burning feet with water even during travel. This is the most perfect product for my situation. I love the fact that it has a handle.
customer_reviews.author: HAZEL

customer_reviews.title: Pretty handy
customer_reviews.text: This basket is a great size, not too big, not too small. And because it is collapsible, it's easy to store. It made a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Received Defective/Cracked Basket
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box and there was a very noticeable crack.
customer_reviews.author: MyLittleAngel

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I feel funny putting items in my reusable grocery bag before I buy them, so I got this. It’s sturdy and compresses small enough to fit behind the driver’s seat. Hope it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Lookin 4

customer_reviews.title: Get one
customer_reviews.text: Love these baskets. I got one and ordered more. They’re durable and sturdy and flexible and very convenient. I cancelled the next order due to delivery problems.
customer_reviews.author: carmen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great basket! Used it for a big Easter basket. Very colorful and can hold a lot. Great for picnicking or holding cleaning products. Very sturdy handle. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: serious man

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bucket
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect bucket for gardening and it's slim size makes storage a snap!
customer_reviews.author: Janine Vink

customer_reviews.title: Space saving,  great camping addition
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be great for a camping sink and as a below water container catch.
customer_reviews.author: WVCINDY

customer_reviews.title: Not My Best Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold. Handles are a thin plastic and cannot handle a lot of weight.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Silveira

customer_reviews.title: This is great for my RV
customer_reviews.text: Great for my RV and perfect size also. It is not too large and folds up and stows away nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Storage is easy
customer_reviews.text: Love these for gathering vegetables from my garden and use for every day tasks year round. When not in use, they collapse easily to store under sink.
customer_reviews.author: bobbi

customer_reviews.title: This is a very versatile collapsible tub. I've used ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very versatile collapsible tub. I've used it for a few different things and it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: DebRom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Not flimsy. Doesn't collapse when washing dishes. Folds up nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought but great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this badkey even though it's smaller than I anticipated. It collapses flat and it's heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Amy A

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for our camping trip. Strong and easily collapsible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful and a space saver.
customer_reviews.text: Super useful and such a great space saver. In our house it’s used for multiple purposes like soaking clothes to hand wash and holding items.
customer_reviews.author: BlueJay

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: Great product for camping. It is sometimes hard to collapse, but easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

product_meta.title: SAMMART 9.2L (2.37Gallon) Collapsible Tub with Handle - Portable Outdoor Picnic Basket/Crater - Foldable Shopping Bag - Space Saving Storage Container (1, Grey)
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1| Color:Grey**Collapsible TPE/PP Basket with Handle **Brand: SAMMART **Material: TPE & PP **Expanded size: 15.1 x 11.3 x 5.5" **Collapsed size: 15.1 x 11.3 x 2.1" **Capacity: 9.2L
feature_bullets: User friendly by simply pop-up to open when using and collapses to flat for space saving
Space saving with Expanded size: 15.1 x 11.3 x 5.5(h) inches and its height just 2.1 inches after folds, save over 60% space when storage. Capacity: 9.2L
Perfect for house, camper, apartment, condo, beach tote and keep in the trunk of your car. Also great for camping, hiking, picnics and boating.
